q1: Can I remove audio from an MP4?
a1: Yes, you can remove audio from MP4, WebM, and MOV files.
q2: Will removing audio reduce file size?
a2: Yes, removing the audio track will slightly reduce the file size since the audio data is stripped.
q3: Can I add new audio after muting?
a3: This tool only removes audio. To add new audio, you would need a video editor.
